name: dark-matter-marketplace
description: Claude Code plugins for Go development, architecture, and productivity

plugins.name: go-pro
plugins.description: Expert Go development skill with idiomatic patterns, concurrency, error handling, and golangci-lint v2 configuration

plugins.name: justfile
plugins.description: Patterns for setting up just (command runner) in projects - covers simple repos and monorepos with hierarchical modules

plugins.name: data-oriented-architecture
plugins.description: Apply data-oriented architecture patterns when designing systems with polymorphic entities - registry-based dispatch, capability composition, and infrastructure-first development

plugins.name: dialectical-refinement
plugins.description: Transform ambiguous specs into implementable work items through adversarial refinement - use /breakdown for spec decomposition, /refine for sharpening items

plugins.name: game-perf
plugins.description: Optimize game code for per-frame performance and GC pressure - identifies allocation anti-patterns and provides zero-allocation alternatives

plugins.name: rust-pro
plugins.description: Expert Rust developer specializing in ownership semantics, zero-cost abstractions, and idiomatic patterns

plugins.name: solid-architecture
plugins.description: SOLID principles, composition patterns, module organization, and side-effect boundary guidelines for writing, reviewing, or refactoring code

plugins.name: typescript-pro
plugins.description: Expert TypeScript developer specializing in advanced type system usage, full-stack development, and build optimization
